page.title: 05Diary of a week in June 1985
page.content: helping on the computer stall. There is going to be a Country Dancing display and a Gymnastics display. There are refreshments in the canteen and some stalls (such as White Elephant, games, records, and posters and badges, plants, painted stones, purses and books). THURSDAY-I had Highly Commended for my sweets last night. It is market day today. Tonight it is Youth Club. It starts at 6.30pm and finishes at 8.30pm. At Youth Club we play games and go places. We play games like hit or football and sometimes we go for walks or have a mini-bus to go to places like Laneka. FRIDAY-It is the last school day today before the weekend. After school I play with my sister and watch television. I used to go to Pony Club in North Molton but I don't any more.
